TopicTitle: Mass of the Ares I-X Rocket

Articles.Content:
Hey everybody,

I am doing a poster design on rockets and am unable to find the mass of the Ares I-X rocket. Anyone have any educated guesses?

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ares_I-X
Probably around 250 tons, assuming a mass simulator for the upper stage...
No way, the first stage was a 4 segment shuttle SRB (with a mass simulator for the 5. segment) which alone is about 600 tons...
